title: Hoover's Ohanian: Fed Policy is 'Not the Right Medicine'(Audio)
itunes:title: Hoover's Ohanian: Fed Policy is 'Not the Right Medicine'(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: FED IN FOCUS: Lee Ohanian, Senior Fellow at the Hoover Institution and Professor of Economics at University of California, on Janet Yellen's testimony and outlook for the Fed's policy.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
